level.text: Board shall certify the results of the election on the Advisory Referendum measure pursuant to ยง 813.1 of this title.
Upon certification, the Board shall transmit, either by personal delivery or by certified mail, the certified results to the Chairman of the Council.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 40 D.C. Reg. 7083, 7093 (October 8, 1993).
